name: EmptyStateComponent

inputsClass.name: horizontal
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether to display it in horizontal layout.
inputsClass.description: Whether to display it in horizontal layout.

description:
A component to show generic empty state. Title and subtitle should be used with translate pipe to mark strings for translation. Component can be displayed vertically (default) or horizontally. Additional markup elements can be placed inside the tag.

Example :
<c8y-ui-empty-state
  [icon]="'c8y-icon'"
  [title]="'Place your title here' | translate"
  [subtitle]="'Place your subtitle here' | translate"
  [horizontal]="true"
>
  (...)
</c8y-ui-empty-state>
rawdescription:
A component to show generic empty state.
Title and subtitle should be used with translate pipe to mark strings for translation.
Component can be displayed vertically (default) or horizontally.
Additional markup elements can be placed inside the tag.

```html
<c8y-ui-empty-state
  [icon]="'c8y-icon'"
  [title]="'Place your title here' | translate"
  [subtitle]="'Place your subtitle here' | translate"
  [horizontal]="true"
>
  (...)
</c8y-ui-empty-state>
```
